# Background of Dengue Fever in Taiwan in 2015

```{r}
pacman::p_load(arrow, lubridate, tidyverse,maptools, sf, spNetwork, raster, spatstat, tmap)
```

## 1. Importing Data

## 1.1 Importing Geospatial Data

```{r}
filtered_tainan_village <- read_rds("data/rds/filtered_tainan_village.rds")
```

```{r}
#print(filtered_tainan_village)
```

```{r}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(filtered_tainan_village) +
  tm_borders()
```

```{r}
tmap_mode("view")
tm_shape(filtered_tainan_village) +
  tm_fill("VILLNAME", 
          alpha = 0.2) +
  tm_borders()
```
